body: I almost always time out during a match. Anyone might know why, or having the same issue?
body_tagged: I almost always time out during a match. Anyone might know why, or having the same issue?
title: I keep timing out.

replies.body: It's server lag. I believe it's being worked on and should be fixed soon, everyone has that problem. :)
replies.body_tagged: It's server lag. I believe it's being worked on and should be fixed soon, everyone has that problem. :)

replies.body: Its a common issue for most people. It is being worked on currently!
replies.body_tagged: Its a common issue for most people. It is being worked on currently!

replies.body:
I've realized this with hosters I used, and what I noticed is, I think it has something to do with spigot and minecraft. I think it's if the server is spigot at the same time you have over 150ms avg.

Not too sure, but what I think is happening due to what I've been through.
